name: Shellter (Dikkop)
description:
Unzip file to a folder. Double Click Shellter.exe to play.

Goal:

Collect as many decorations as possible to grow your home and live together!

Controls: 

You need 2 XBox controllers:

Left stick to move
Hold Left Trigger to enter Shell
Hold Right Trigger to pickup item
Hold Right Trigger to revive crab
Right Stick to aim light from shell

Back to restart game

The game was made for Global Game Jam 2019!

Jelle van Aanholt - Audio
Kevin van As - Game Design & Development
Manou van der Meer - Art
Sam Morris - Art
Valentijn Muijrers - Game Design & Development
